attributes.action: THE RED ARROWS TO FLY  AT THE OLYMPICS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: EVERY BODY I KNOW IS FED UP WITH THE IDIOTS CALLED PCS. I`TS ABOUT TIME THOSE IN POWER HAD THE GUTS TO LISTEN TO THE PUBLIC,AND DEFEND THIS GREAT NATION AND SHOUT ABOUT IT TO THE WORLD.IF PEOPLE DON`T LIKE US    THEN THEY SHOULD GO BACK TO WHERE THEY CAME FROM

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
